settings.content: To display the countdown timer on a product, apply the tag 'display-countdown'. To define the max time on the countdown 'expire-x' is required, 'expire-24' for example would be a 24 hour countdown. The countdown timer is based on the original publish time of the product and is evergreen.

No need to use 'expire-x' tag when using Timer 3. Simply apply the 'display-countdown' tag to any products to show this timer. To go granular with timer 3, use tag 'timer3-36000' for a 10 hour evergreen countdown for example.

settings.label: Currency notification text part 2
settings.default: . While the content of your cart is currently displayed in

settings.label: Currency notification text part 4
settings.default: at the most current exchange rate.

settings.content: To offer multiple currencies on your online store, you must first [edit your store's currency formatting](https://docs.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/troubleshooting/help-script-find-money-formats).
Although you will be able to display prices on your storefront in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD INR GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.info: If no page is selected, no default message will display.

settings.label: Speak To Help Text
settings.info: 404 page help text for Speak to our exper, default "Speak to one of our ridiculously helpful Experts and they'll scour our product list for what you need (even if it's not on our website)." will display.

settings.content: To display a product in the deal of the day widget, tag it with 'deal-yyyy-mm-dd'. This product will appear as the deal of the day on the date that you picked (eg. deal-2017-05-10). You can tag more products and add more than one tag to the same product.

settings.label: Enable deal of the day
settings.info: If you are not using any deal-yyyy-mm-dd tag in your products, you should disable this feature. Leaving it enabled may cause a performance drop.

settings.label: Main text
settings.default: DEAL OF THE DAY ENDS IN

settings.label: Enable GEOIP
settings.info: Disabling the GEO IP feature will lead to a slightly faster page-load, but will turn off visitor country recognition feature and other theme features based on this code. These features include, but are not limited to: domestic delivery recognition, free shipping delivery recognition, free shipping threshold function.
